page.title: 1545 YEARS AGO
page.content: 45 YEARS AGO MRS.NEWELL TOLD US OF THE VILLAGE 45 YEARS AGO. TRNASPORT WAS MAINLY BY BUS OR TRAIN. MANY ROADS WERE UNMADE BUT SOME HAD HARD SURFACES. THERE WERE MANY HIGH HEDGES. BRYANT AND MAY PLANTED A LARGE FOREST OF POPLARS, WHICH WERE TO BE USED FOR MAKING MATCHES. MOST VILLAGERS WERE EMPLOYED IN NURSERIES WHERE BULBS AND FLOWERS,ASPARAGUS AND SALAD CROPS WERE GROWN.THE FLOWERS WERE DESPATCHED DAILY BY TRAIN FAR AND WIDE -EVEN TO SCOTLAND. HOMES WERE HEATED BY OPEN FIRE RANGES-AN OVEN ON ONE SIDE AND A WATER BOILER ON THE OTHER.FLAT IRONS WERE HEATED IN FRONT OF THE FIRE SO YOU COULD IRON THE CLOTHES.
